description: Rules for extracting Pack Size (number of packages/bottles in the product)
instructions: Extract the pack size if explicitly mentioned. Look for keywords like 'pack', 'bottles', 'pack of', 'case of'. If NOT mentioned, default to 1 (single unit).
default_reasoning: No pack keywords found, default to 1
